text:
Sigh, this game was meh. I didn't like its soundtrack or new art style at all. I really felt like Dawn failed us as AoS2. I guess it could've been a lot worse but it could've definitely been a whole lot better. I felt really unsatisfied with it. I absolutely adored AoS.

I don't remember this song at all, either.
author: genesisSOC

text: This is from  the recent Castlevania Tribute album that was released with different themes covered by various popular composers. I thought this theme was pretty forgettable on the DS (I didn't even remember about it) but I love this chill cover, which is by Eriko Imura (Klonoa series composer).
author: SupraDarky
